subject: Football
lead_paragraph: At 7-8, the Giants are tied with four other teams for the sixth, and final, playoff slot in the N.F.C. But remarkably, the Giants now own the tie-breaking advantage over all of them.
snippet: At 7-8, the Giants are tied with four other teams for the sixth, and final, playoff slot in the N.F.C. But remarkably, the Giants now own the tie-breaking advantage over all of them.
